name: EzGate Test
description:
This is a test game to show what I can do in RPG Maker VX Ace Lite. If I recieve enough Donations, I can buy RPG Maker VX Ace, and RPG Maker MV if I switched to Arch OS by that time.

Note: I understand it is impossible to beat all 3 test enemies. I cannot be for sure that 2 are possible but 1 is for sure impossible.
